name: places/ChIJ50ltDptZwokRgZWwSCreJPE
formattedAddress: 286 Hudson St, New York, NY 10013, USA
adrFormatAddress: 286 Hudson St, New York, NY 10013, USA

originalText.text:
The ony thing great about rentng from this company was returning it!

Why did I drive it off the sidewalk...because I NEEDED a vehicle to get to two company events happening over the weekend and had NO OTHER WAY to get to them!

The vehicle was DIRTY! The male that walked me through the process of getting the vehicle from them that day half azz vacuumed the vehicle, yet the vehicle was visibly DIRTY!
The seats, the floor, the stirring wheel, the middle console...ALL of it!
I am very thnkful that I seem to always make sure to have cleaning wipes on a "just in case", and in this was a case!

The control panel did not work properly!
Only the far left of the control panel worked...if it worked at all.
The phone was able to connct to the vehicle due to the control not working properly.

Before pulling off their lot I showed and explained this problem to their guy onsite; he attempted to get the panel to work and it didn't!

The day I was due to return the vehicle I reached out to their office and was told to hold, hold and hold some more while they verified whatever it was they needed to.

I was instructed to return the vehicle so they could review/examine it and they would get beack to me.
My possibilities were me getting an extra day to have the vehicle on them, a partial refund, a credit, etc.

It is now been 1 1/2 weeks later and I have heard nothing...from anyone!

The vehicle options from this location were honestly not options at all!
I rented this vehicle through Expedia; the name of the rental company said Routes, not EZ Car Rental, so keep this in mind when renting!
The rental location I receivd my vehicle from in Manhattan  Hudson Street.

If I have not said so, I do NOT recommend renting from this/these companies, especially this location!

I have a better video of the dirt in the vehicle; this doesn't give you the option to upload video though! I wish it did!

originalText.text:
It's Friday night before a Saturday travel day.

I cancelled the booking just now, which is 8 hours before pickup because I didn't get a response from the agency/office about wether or not the storefront  is actually open on Saturday and if it was possible to add another day to my reservation.

Other reviews stated that they were difficult to pickup from. Also wether or not you were able to use your credit card insurance.

I wanted to extend the reservation by one day and called three times today, all three times was directed to the New Jersey location which transferred me directly to the location on Hudson  by the tunnel. I asked if they location was open on Saturdays and the man in NJ said they were definitely open on Saturdays, contrary to what Google says. He told me this is because they are Jewish and observe Saturday as a holy day. So they are closed on Saturdays, even though my reservation was supposed to start on Saturday. I asked that the NJ location email the Manhattan (Hudson) location and call me back to clarify because I wasn't able to get this info from the regular channels.

When the NJ location transferred my call each time, they never picked up the phone and I left voicemails.

The voicemails I left for that location asked two questions:
1) Are you open on Saturday?
2) Can I extend my reservation by a day?

It's now 1:00 am on Saturday and I'm cancelling the reservation because I don't have the answers to my questions and I never received a  call back.

Quick update from Saturday morning: Someone called my phone and asked if I had rented a car (didn't immediately identify himself from the rental agency). I said that I had cancelled the reservation earlier that day and he immediately hung up on me :(

**Customers Remember, if you cancel a reservation less than 6 hours before the rental is supposed to begin, you will be charged a fee.** And since I wasn't able to get my very valid questions answered before the no-penalty cancellation window was about to end, of course I would cancel.

originalText.text:
I wish I could give this place a negative O stars
this has been one of the worst experiences of my
life I rented a car from this company and I got
there today and when I arrived there was no one
there or no cars but there was a man in a white
van but I had no idea it was him and he drove off
so quick I stood outside in the blistering cold
trying to contact the supervisor who then said that
the shop is closed and no other way to get the
rental. There is a laz parking on the corner and so
I went inside and knocked on the door and the laz
worker told me that the man was just there and he
left. I asked if he can call him he said sure he
started to speak Spanish on the phone and then
said he didn't pick up the shop is closed but I
speak Spanish so I wouldn't expect him to know
that because I appear to be just black and the guy
did answer the phone and pretty much told the
LAZ worker he is not coming back . So I called
back the company and asked to be in sent to
another location or a refund they stated they can't
give me a refund until the company confirms the
car hadn't been driven in which that was
confirmed because I have pictures that I will attach with no cars in the lot and no one there.
And to top it off I have no refund And I tried to get
another rental but because it's the holidays no
cars are available. So thanks EZ for making this
one of the worst Christmas's ever and to all of you
who may consider reserving a rental from this
unprofessional piss poor of a place I would advise
you not to unless you want to waste unnecessary
money and time .

originalText.text: Rented a car got to the place for a thanksgiving trip and the guy wouldn’t rent to me saying I don’t have insurance. My credit card has insurance on it. He was also rude and disrespectful towards me.  Avoid at all costs
